heroSubtitle: Shiksha Chaupal: Stories from Villages Across India
heroDescription: Every village has a story. Discover how grassroots efforts are helping more girls go to school. Join us to make a difference in their lives.
step1Description: Capture the inspiring work of women’s groups fighting for equal education.
step2Description: Help these groups get noticed and funded to grow their efforts.
step3Description: Bring grassroots groups together to share ideas and grow stronger.

reports.title: Share Your Story
reports.description: Your reports help us uncover why girls miss school and find solutions to improve education for all.

form.problem_faced: Problem Faced (Why girls are not coming to school)

reports.traveling_issue: Girls face traveling issues due to lack of safe transportation.
reports.traveling_solution: We are working with local authorities to provide safe bus services for girls.
reports.toilet_issue: Lack of clean toilets for girls in the school.
reports.toilet_solution: We have arranged separate cleaning staff for girls toilets and raised awareness among students.
reports.misbehavior_issue: Misbehavior by teachers towards girls is a major concern.
reports.misbehavior_solution: We have initiated teacher training programs to promote gender sensitivity and respectful behavior.
reports.relationship_issue: Inappropriate relationships between boys and girls are causing problems.
reports.relationship_solution: We have started awareness programs for students and parents.

dashboard.title: Data Dashboard
dashboard.description: This page is for Government officers, NGOs and committees to understand the data points to solve problems strategically.

content.whoWeAre: Shiksha Sankalp is a platform dedicated to empowering grassroots education initiatives. Our mission is to document and amplify the efforts of women’s collectives working tirelessly to improve education equity for young girls.
content.ourMission: We aim to provide visibility to these initiatives, enabling governments, NGOs, and donors to recognize and support their work. By creating a structured database of issues and solutions, we help scale successful interventions and foster collaboration among grassroots groups.
content.howWeWork: Through our platform, users can join sessions, discuss challenges, and submit reports documenting issues and solutions. Our dashboard provides insights into common problems, proposed solutions, and trends over time, making it easier for stakeholders to take action.
